title: Jupiter Transit in the 6th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Jupiter transiting the 6th house expands focus on service, discipline, health management, and problem-solving. This phase supports ethical handling of conflicts, steady improvement in routines, and constructive engagement in work environments. You may take on advisory roles in service settings, using wisdom to resolve disputes. However, overconfidence in handling issues or neglecting practical limits can strain health or workload balance. When humility guides effort, this transit strengthens resilience, efficiency, and sustainable progress through responsible service.

sections.heading: Health & Discipline
points: Risk of excess due to optimism

closing: Jupiter in the 6th house rewards humility and disciplined service. Responsible effort converts challenges into steady improvement.
